name: Baked Garlic Cajun Fries
description: Delicious baked cajun garlic fries. Vegan, gluten free, nut free recipe.
recipeIngredient: 2  potatoes cut length wise (1/4 inch width)

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the potatoes and boil them for 5 mins or until tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Cut the potatoes and boil them for 5 mins or until tender.

recipeInstructions.text: Strain and keep for 10 minutes on a paper towel
recipeInstructions.name: Strain and keep for 10 minutes on a paper towel

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, mash teh garlic.
recipeInstructions.name: In a small bowl, mash teh garlic.

recipeInstructions.text: Add olive oil  and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add olive oil  and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the potatoes, cajun spice and salt and toss well to coat.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the potatoes, cajun spice and salt and toss well to coat.

recipeInstructions.text: Place potatoes on a baking sheet, individually.
recipeInstructions.name: Place potatoes on a baking sheet, individually.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 10 minutes at 350 degrees F and then broil for 2-3 minutes. You can broil longer for crispier and browner potatoes.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 10 minutes at 350 degrees F and then broil for 2-3 minutes. You can broil longer for crispier and browner potatoes.

keywords: Baked fries, Healthy fries, homemade fries
